short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a random quote every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing experience with the Random Quote Tab extension. Transform your new tab page into a source of daily inspiration and motivation with beautifully presented quotes that encourage, uplift, and provide a moment of reflection.

Daily Inspiration: Each time you open a new tab, be greeted by a thoughtfully curated quote, presented with an eye-catching animation that mimics handwriting.

Customizable Themes: Easily switch between a light and dark theme with a simple toggle, ensuring a comfortable viewing experience day or night.

Google Search Integration: Effortlessly search the web without leaving your new tab. The integrated Google search bar makes it convenient to find what you need.

Enhance Your Day: Start each browsing session with a touch of inspiration. The quotes are designed to uplift your spirits and spark creativity.

Seamless Integration: The extension blends seamlessly with your workflow, providing quick access to Google search right from the new tab.

Personalize Your Experience: Whether you prefer a light or dark theme, you can easily toggle between them to suit your mood or environment.

Beautiful Design: Enjoy the aesthetic appeal of a clean, modern design with smooth animations and a user-friendly interface.

Transform your ordinary new tab page into a source of positivity and functionality with the Random Quote Tab extension. Install now to start each day with a dose of motivation and a convenient search experience!
